website_summaries.verdict: A safe and comfy heated pet bed that works well for small pets.
pros: Available in 16- and 20-inch sizes, this simple heating bed is an excellent choice for cats and small dogs that heats to match your pet's body temperature
The removable heater makes cleaning straightforward

customer_reviews.title: Close to ZERO warmth!
customer_reviews.text: So far my poor elderly cat doesn't like his new bed. He'd rather lay on the ceramic tile in the sun. The bed has been plugged in for over 15 hours straight and it is barely warm. The floor underneath the bed is way warmer than the part where my pet is supposed to be resting his poor arthritic bones. Thinking I need to return the bed and suck up the return shipping fees. Not to mention the packaging wasn't too great either as part of the bed is square and the other part is circular. Super bummed!!
customer_reviews.author: Knight

customer_reviews.title: no heat
customer_reviews.text: Hoped this would help my poor cold cat, based on reviews, but nope. This didn't get warm at all, not even slightly. I left it on for 24 hrs, nothing. I tried putting my hand on it and left it there to see if there was any warmth at all, nothing. I waited and tried it again another day, same process, same results. The bed seems like it would be comfortable, but I bought it for the heat. Also, Amazon shoved it into a box that was narrower than the bed, so it is now oval, not round. After a few days to fill out, still hasn't. Disappointing all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Truth CrusaderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Where are all the five stars review coming from?
customer_reviews.text: Ok- I'd like to cut the chase. This cat bed looks cheap at best. The foam around it bends unevenly- in short, the shape is not round. Now for the bed- my cat laid on it for a few minutes. The bedding is thin and flimsy and not plush compared to my other cat beds. The heater is barely working and does not provide adequate heat for my older cat. This product fits the bill- 'you get what you paid for'.
customer_reviews.author: Sancerre Sap

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect! My husband and I are gone all day at work and we let our house get pretty chilly while we’re gone. I always worried that our cat was getting cold while we were away. This bed is the perfect solution! She absolutely loves it and is always laying in it. It also gives me peace of mind for when we’re out of town and she’s alone almost all day. She’s a major lap cat and loves stealing your body warmth. Now while we’re out of town she can cuddle in her bed. Don’t hesitate- buy this for your cat!
customer_reviews.author: CaitlinRTodd

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t heat, cats ignored it.
customer_reviews.text: Returning, this bed doesn’t heat! I purchased this cat bed in the 20 inch size. Had I known this used the same super-thin hard plastic non- heating square that I have a similar one of, I’d never have bought it. First, even if you get the larger bed, the small square “heating pad” is the same. It is covered by about 6 inches of foam and padding, and even after testing it by putting weight on it for 35 minutes and feeling the pad bare handed and directly, there was barely any heat (would have no effect bare, certainty none covered up). I’m going to search for a Lectro-soft mat instead. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for large pug.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a large pug and he likes it very much. Warms up only when something is in it, as promised. He does still go to his old bed sometimes, so it's probably good to have options. I wish it were a little more padded in the bottom. Guess i could put something under it.
customer_reviews.author: EbbyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: My cat is addicted to this bed.
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this bed, he is always in it now. Thick cushion, warm but not hot. The downfall of this product is that the cushion is not removable so you have to wash the entire bed if your cats decides to vomit. The electrical pad is removable at least, but it is super inconvenient to have to wash the entire bed. Our bed shrank a bit when we did wash it :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Large bed has a TINY heating pad
customer_reviews.text: The larger bed comes with a TINY heating pad; less than half of the bed ever gets warm. (And the cats have to figure out which small section is auto-heating at any given time.) Clearly the manufacturer is trying to cut corners by making only one size of heating pad for both sizes of the bed, perhaps hoping no one will bother to look under the pillow / figure this out until it's too late to return. Update: Response from the manufacturer is "It enables your pet to either be heated or not but use the bed either way." LOLZ. What a great "feature."
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8 pound senior cat that I wanted to provide warmth for. I thought this size would be plenty large enough for her, but it’s tiny. I even measured the diameter of her current unheated bed and this should have been large enough for her. She’s curious about it and has approached it. But I think due to its size she won’t get in it. Anyway, I guess I’m going to have to order the next size up. But that will have to wait a month until I have some “extra” money again. Really disappointing. I just want her comfortable. I know what it is to be a senior and want warmth on my joints!
customer_reviews.author: Mohican

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t heat up at all.
customer_reviews.text: This bed seemed perfect. I got it in, plugged it in and nothing. It barely got warm. I could only tell if was warm when I unzipped it and shoved my hand in the tiny opening. there was no way of me taking out the pad to see if it even got warm. I was extremely disappointment. I wouldn’t recommend this product and now I’m on the hunt to keep my Sphynx warm.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Gustin

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely feel the heat. People don't realize it is a low heat ,you don't want to fry your cat. The low wattage brings up their body temp to a safe and normal level. Great for my 16 year old baby. Very pleased, My bed was smashed some what in the wrappings but quickly went back to shape. Very pleased Worth every penny. UPDATE: Had an issue and called their customer service line-no way to reach anyone and no call backs. How do you get help with your warranty with this lack of response?
customer_reviews.author: Kat E.

customer_reviews.title: Car loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for out cat that some health issues and has lost a lot of weight. He always seems to be cold and wants to be in a warm place. It took him a few minutes to figure out that this bed is geared but now that he has he's always laying on it! Occasionally one of the other cats has use it when he's been eating or something but it's definitely his bed! I was a little disappointed at first because the pillow over the heating pad is so thinck I could not feel the heat at all. Once something is on the pillow and compresses it the heat comes through.
customer_reviews.author: uijoonbug

customer_reviews.title: Comfort “blanket”
customer_reviews.text: My 11year old cat loves her bed. She used to try to steal my heating pad whenever I would walk away, so I bought her the shorter version of this bed over a year ago. She stopped sleeping in my room at night and would instead stay in her bed in the living room. Lola likes it when I sit in the living room with a blanket on and she will climb onto my lap, put the blanket in her mouth, and then knead. I was so surprised when she first climbed into this bed with the higher rim, started sucking on the edge, and kneading the bed. I’m glad it brings her such comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kat'sKorner

customer_reviews.title: A fussy cat's favorite bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat refused to use any other bed and I was worried that this would be another case of "I hate you and everything you give me". However, I asked a few people at the vet and there seemed to be a consensus that if my cat didn't like the bed she would be part of the 1%. So I caved and got it. There is now no other bed that she uses. The material feels very soft, the ability to unzip and clean is convenient. The fact that it is only passive warming is amazing. My cat loves it, which means I love it. Updated with photo for proof of usage :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Loved it right away
customer_reviews.text: I was persuaded by the woman who said she had lost her cat to this bed... Well, she wasn't far off! My cat doesn't usually go for "cat stuff" she prefers to appropriate people stuff. But she jumped into this bed right away and stayed there for 6+ hours. The small is a nice size for her and she seems to prefer the bed now to her many other options much of the time now. It's not the most elegant looking thing, but I will likely be getting a second one to have in another room for her.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Virskus

customer_reviews.title: They fight over who gets it
customer_reviews.text: My critters stare each other down when this is occupied. I ended up buying quite a few of these so they do not fight. Fits both my oversized 16lb cat or two Yorkies at once. They use these all the time regardless of whether it is summer or winter. The height is perfect for them to feel safe or to hang their head over as a pillow. Definitely recommend, after all I have 3 of them. I had 5 total but one darn cat decided to mark two as her own And we could not get them clean-yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Genice J.

customer_reviews.title: Took some time, but cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: It took a week or so before the cat started using it, but he loves it. I've had to clean it a few times, both from just normal use and one time the cat got sick. It was pretty easy to get the heating pad out and put it in the normal wash. Time to put it back together, including the foam wall, was just a few minutes (since you do have to finagle the foam around the edge to keep the walls).
customer_reviews.author: Tails

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has several beds to choose from, and this is one of her favorites. She has arthritis, and I wanted to get her a bed with some warmth. It is not overly warm, but probably similar to the amount of heat cats are always attracted to: a sunny spot on the carpet, a car hood, a lap. She is 18 lbs and has plenty of room. It has that “nest” kind of shape and she loves to rest her chin on the edge. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect
customer_reviews.text: My Bengal kitty loves it! I got the large one which works well, but I think he could have fit into the smaller one too because he has tons of space in this one. Doesn’t stay too warm when plugged in, and now I finally have a solution to my car wanting to sleep next to me every night. Now he’d usually want to sleep in this heated bed. It also seems to be high quality, like it will last a long time. But I’ve only had it for a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dellacroce

customer_reviews.title: nice bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product, construction is great, materials are outstanding. Everything about this is great.....only our cats want nothing to do with them! The female has been in it once in 3 months and the male might use it every 10 or so. We invested $100 on things that sit on the nightstands. They seem to sleep everywhere but in those beds. They are rather large, if that has something to do with it, hopefully your cats will use them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: A perfect snuggle bed for our aging and lonely cat.
customer_reviews.text: Our 17 year old cat misses her roomie, who left for college in the fall. Since then, the cat has decided to campout on my bed and whines a lot! We bought this bed in hopes she would like the continued warmth, swap places and stop whining. For the most part - 100% success. She still needs her people fix every now and then, but most of the time, we can find her quietly snuggled up in her new bed. Should have bought this a long time ago! Might even buy another one, because she likes to hop between 2 bedrooms for attention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need another right away!
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of coaxing to get my 9.5lb tiger to stay in this 16" one, but once he stayed, he stayed for a long time. When he got up and out, I wasn't expecting my 17lb fat boy to climb in as he showed little to no interest. Wow...was I wrong!! So...as of right now, I now need to order another but in the 20". I can't speak of durability, but it's soft and I imagine will be super easy to clean since it all basically comes apart and can be tossed in the washer. I will update should I have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Centaurette

customer_reviews.title: The Peterbald cat approves!
customer_reviews.text: My Peterbald LOVES this thing! I have two for him. One on the kitchen counter since he likes to be in there when we are in there. The other is on his cat tree since he thinks he is king and needs to sit up high to look down on we mere peasants while staying toasty warm! Its is adequately padded for comfort but I do have have a small blanket underneath it to add more comfort. Our household will always have these beds around. They really are a cat's delight!
customer_reviews.author: E-ma Shops

customer_reviews.title: The only cat bed they will actually sleep in
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned cats for over 20 years and have always known them to like a cardboard box better than a soft, fluffy cat bed. I was nervous that they wouldn’t like this, but after 1.5 years, my cats still LOVE it. All three of the gremlins adore this bed. There’s at least one of them in it at all times. It’s held up so well. The heating function is not too hot, just warm enough. The fabric doesn’t attract their hair, and it fits even the chonkist cat (i.e. my 22 pound Maine Coon mix). I have nothing my great things to say about this “heaty bed” and have recommended to all my cat friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Slivka

customer_reviews.title: Happy kitten
customer_reviews.text: My kitten has struggled to find sleep in our apt and this bed has REALLY helped! My only complaint is that it took 15+ minutes to actually get warm, idk if that was just mine or if they're all like this but that seemed a little long to me. After it warmed up we haven't had any issues though! (I do wish It had an on/off switch with a light or something to indicate it is actually on and working)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Martin

customer_reviews.title: 1st Cat Bed That “Worked”!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m ordering my 2nd bed and wanted to encourage anyone with doubts that this is a fantastic heated bed! My senior kitty had never taken to any “cat bed” her entire life, until I bought this one at the age of 14. She took to it immediately (to my surprise), and still LOVES it. The heat and snuggle factors seem to be perfect for her. She’s now 18 years and in good health, so I’m buying a 2nd one to keep on the 1st floor for her.
customer_reviews.author: Playing Favorites

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later, Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bed for 3 years and 4 months now and I recommend it to anyone! Is super soft, the cushion has maintained its fluffy ness, the electric pad still works, is super easy so take the foam apart to wash the actual bed in the washer. The fabric is really good quality! 3 years later I decided to leave a review because I was impressed that it still looks like new. (My cat uses it every day)
customer_reviews.author: JG&GPG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect warming bed for your small pet
customer_reviews.text: My teacup yorkie is 14 years old and absolutely LOVES this warming bed. He's a little guy, only 5 lbs, so we went with the "cat" bed but it works perfectly for him. He spends hours a day in this bed and clearly it has made him a happy dog. I only wish we had gotten him one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: pets love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger size so that any of my pets could use it. It took all of 3 minutes after plugging it in for my dog (who is always cold) to hop right in and fall asleep! We also found our cat snoodled into it in the middle of the night, so it's safe to say pets love this! We leave it plugged in all day, and it stays room temp until one of them lays in it. We are happy to have added this to our pet bed collection as we live in Wisconsin and winter is just around the corner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DogLady

customer_reviews.title: Once cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: Only one of my cats has taken interest in this bed, but it took several months. It's fairly soft but makes a "crinkly" sound, which I think is the turn-off for the other cats. The cover is fuzzy but very synthetic. I use a pet hair remover to clean it. I do not feel confident it will hold up well through washing. As for the heating component, I honestly cannot make an assessment if it's good or not because my cat did not start using it until it was warm out, so it is currently unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Cozy
customer_reviews.text: The bed is a hit! The girls love them! In any time of the year, too! Plug them in and the kitties are comfy and happy. They are easy to take apart, throw in the washer and put back together again. Would definitely recommend them to everyone. Have had them for 4 years now and both beds work great. The tabby has gotten bigger and stretches out over the edge but still curls up and loves the warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and nice warmth makes them very popular
customer_reviews.text: These cat beds are great. In 16 inch it is a little small for the boys but good for the smaller cats we have. The 22 inch bed we have is more popular than the smaller one. The cats seem to like the "wall" all around them too. And although these are washable we cover them with blankets so we don't need to take them apart and re-assemble for washing. Good quality as one of the beds is almost 10 years old and still works!
customer_reviews.author: FSI

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor use as long as its out of the rain/snow
customer_reviews.text: I live in the wide open farmland of il. It gets down to -35 some days. I made a cat house put straw on the floor and put the large 20inch warming bed on top of the straw. When i go to feed the barn cats they seem fine not shivering or look like they are cramped up from being cold. Look like they got some good zzz's.Now the cat house is in the barn out of the rain ect... so its perfect for your barn cats to stay warm. As long as its in a garage, enclosed porch ect... very happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard R Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: 16 year old cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bed and so far my senior cat who is 16 loves it. I got it because my senior cat always wants to sit/lay on my playstation to stay warm and i just wanted her to be more comfortable. Didn't take her long to figure out that it was warm and way more comfortable than the playstation. Only complaint is it have not indicator that its on and no temp control. Just plugs in and thats it. So far so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Senior Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Got this on an open package deal from Amazon Warehouse and it is perfect for my senior kitty. I can leave it plugged in, but it does not heat up until she lays down. It is almost instantaneous. This is going to keep her old bones toasty all winter long. Such a GREAT deal! The entire bed unzips and the cover can be removed for washing. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Returned- Couldn't Feel Heat
customer_reviews.text: Tried plugging it in for HOURS and couldn't feel any heat. I tried pressing my hand all over it and felt no heat. I unzipped the whole thing and the pad was heating. In fact, you could feel more heat through the bottom of the bed than the top. I understand not wanting to toast pets, but I couldn't feel a dang thing. Returned the bed without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described, too soft with needed xtra blanket
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8lb chi for the winter. He loved it. Only prob was because of his bad back and the need for a blanket layer (it does get very warm the blanket is very important) it would cause my chi to have back issues. Otherwise worked as described, a little on the cheap side the warming pad is kinda small but HOT when something is on it.
customer_reviews.author: Hercy

customer_reviews.title: Good for old cats
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat over 20 and 2 cats in their late teens and they each have a heated bed. I live in the mountains and two of the cats stay in the garage in the winter time, they cats seem very happy. I gave it a 3 stars for cleaning because I do have a little difficulty taking it apart to put in the washer, I would not make this a reason not to considering buying.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi in California

customer_reviews.title: The high sides make this the favorite heated bed in the house!
customer_reviews.text: My cats adore this bed. I've bought other K&H heated pet beds before, but the tall sides on this makes my small cat feel safe and cozy. She sleeps in it under my desk while I work and she'll stay there for hours. Like other K&H heated cat beds, this bed has a pressure sensor and only gets warm when weight is applied, such as the cat getting in. My cats are familiar with how these beds work and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Ummm yeah. Should of bought this a long time ago. Best price for one of these beds I’ve seen. Just by it. If the 100 of cat photos on this product don’t make you think it’s a good investment then I don’t know what will. Tip: remember to zip it before throwing it in the washer or the foam piece will come out. It’s an easy fix but avoidable.
customer_reviews.author: Babyfoxs

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in all respects. The price was great and the construction is well thought out. Everythings attached so it stays in place during use, but can humans can detach things for cleaning. I was concerned that a heated bed might be a fire hazard to whatever it's sitting on, but nope. It's just fine. The heating element has cushioning between it and the cat so my cat stays in it for hours without burning. My house heat is off when I'm at work and the house gets cold. This bed is the perfect way for my cat to warm up before I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My story is similar to others- my cat has never liked cat beds, never wanted to get in any of them and just chewed on all of them. Well, I got her this one because of all the reviews of other people who said their cat-bed-hating cats loved it, and mine is no different. She chewed on the edge a little at first but then once she discovered the warmth she decided it was worthy of respect and ceased chewing. It's a very subtle warmth and you can barely feel it while the cat isn't in it, but I think it really gets magnified once they lay down.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Hairless cats aren’t a fan
customer_reviews.text: I have hairless cats and thought they would love this but they both didn’t care for it. They went and laid on the traditional beds instead that had no warmer. I did the warm test with a pillow and the bed didn’t seem to get very warm at all. I don’t know if I just got a bad unit or what but it didn’t warm to my expectations so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopperbob

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a blessing! Both my cats love their new beds. They especially love the warmth of the bed when it is plugged in. I put both of them into their beds, one settled right away while the other ran off a few times before settling into it. If you’re able to see the photos provided, you’ll see they both love this product! They are visibly more happy when they wake up and get much more rest in the evenings. I 100% recommend this product if you love your cat or kittens. Two cats fit in one bed, but it’s snug. My cats prefer their own bed. Great for kittens especially with the warmth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your fur baby will love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have one small dog and one cat who are both 10+. These heated beds are all around my house and they love them. It’s rare to find them lounging anywhere else. I have bought them as gifts for the pets of friends and family. I wash them frequently on the delicate cycle and they hold up well. I have yet to encounter a pet (mine, friend’s or family’s) that doesn’t appreciate these heated beds.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size OK for larger cat
customer_reviews.text: My large arthritic cat lives in this heated bed. I was going between the cost of the large one and the smaller one wondering whether the smaller would be big enough and it is. It is a low temperature for indoors, so my cat doesn't have to leave it to cool down. Not sure it would be warm enough for outdoors. I have the higher watt pad out in my garage for a stray that wants to stay outside at night and this keeps her nice and warm during winter in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: SuzinotSue

customer_reviews.title: She never leaves
customer_reviews.text: My sweet tiny kitty found this bed as soon as I unpacked it, and now I always know where to find her. She’s a tiny little thing (about 6-7 pounds), and always cold. I put it near her usual spot, and she was curled up there by the time I got home from work. It wasn’t even plugged in yet, and she was content. Now that she knows it gets warm, she’s in heaven. This is the purrfect bed for my little heat-seeking-kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Moothart

customer_reviews.title: Heat does NOT come through bedding on small size bed
customer_reviews.text: heat does not come through the bedding. I couldn't understand it as the heating pad warms but when you put your hand on top of the bedding (I got the small) even after an hour. The company let me exchange it but same experience. Even my at chose to go to a new bed over this when I put them side by side. Sorry I waited past the return policy as well as recycled or pitched the packaging. I may try to open up the being encasement which covers the heating pad and take some out to make it thinner?? The bed is very well-made however! Maybe not a problem on the larger size??
customer_reviews.author: Sydney C

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has been stealing my electric blanket so I got this for him. I plugged it in, went to the bathroom for 5 minutes, he's been in it ever since. He hasn't woken up, only to get food lmao. It's so soft too! I love it. I just got it so I haven't washed it yet but the heat pack is easy to take out and put in. I got large, not knowing what the dimensions equal, I don't measure stuff, but got nervous when I saw it thinking it was too small smh.... Thought my fat cat wouldn't fit lol but it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charice

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy - must have for all cats!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item, I needed one for cat #2. My cats love this cozy, warm bed, one would steal it from the other. I’ve had the first one for more than a year. (Still going strong.) Warms up quickly from the weight of the cat, cools down when they get up, so only runs when they are in it. They just love it, and I recommend it for anyone with a cat or smaller dog.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: My cats begged me to write this review!
customer_reviews.text: OH MEOW GEE... how can I possibly say enough good things about this bed? My two cats FIGHT over it daily, sometimes even pile in there together. They are both 17lbs, so as you can imagine, that is a whole lot of fatness crammed into one small bed. The biggest size is perfection for one big cat though. The amount of heat is perfect, not too hot, more just slightly-above-body-temperature-warm. And the sides are firm, so they love to drape their legs or head over the sides. Seriously, if you do nothing else good for your cat, buy them one of these. My cats would write love songs about it if they could <3
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because another reviewer (who is clearly a Crazy Cat Lady <g>) said she has a dozen cats and several of these that are always in use. When I'm buying things for my cats, I always trust the Crazy Cat Lady reviews, and this one was spot on. My cat spends a big chunk of her day in this bed. We put it up on a trunk in front of a window, so she can be warm and comfy while still staying on Neighborhood Watch. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Suetois

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it and he is picky
customer_reviews.text: I went to my son's house and saw that they had this bed for their cat, which she was in. I thought "great idea" for my "Caspurr" since he gets shaved twice a year and gets cold easily. I immediately plugged it in to get it warm for him following his grooming appointment. I was surprised he got in right away and stayed, since he's very picky about his furniture and toys. As you can see, he really likes it! He's about 10lbs and this is a size large.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly S

customer_reviews.title: Not an instant hit
customer_reviews.text: I got this set up on my desk where my little tuxedo likes to hang out. She wanted nothing to do with it. Then I found one of my old t-shirts that hadn't been washed since I last wore it and laid it in the bed. Next time I looked, there she was! Now she spends lots of time in there, on her back, legs askew, eyes closed... I think she likes it!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves her bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed and I am sure my little kitten does too! We got this for her when she was only a month old and she didn't use it too much because it was a bit hard for her to get in and out of when she was so tiny. But she's 1.5 years old now and absolutely LOVES her bed. We live in Michigan where winters are freezing cold so she definitely appreciates the warmth. Sometimes I even see her "fold" one of the sides down to make an armrest as she lounges in it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I live in a cement block homestead with only a fireplace and wood stove for heat. I was really worried about my small animals welfare on the concrete floors in the winter so I bought a bunch of heated blankets and heated animals beds. The blankets (intended for human use) literally all broke within a few weeks. These beds however works exactly as expected - I love this bed for my cats and small dogs so much that this is the 3rd one I've purrrrchased. I've also purchased the larger, oval dog version. I've been super happy with all of them - easy to disassemble and wash. Thank you for making a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anessa Woods

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cats
customer_reviews.text: Best cat product ever! This is my second one of these beds. Had to get a second because my cats kept trying to get in the first at the same time. The first one it took a little bit to get them to lay in it instead of on me but once they laid in it and realized it warmed up they were hooked! Now that its getting cold I figured I better have one for each. From an owners perspective I also like it doesn't get too hot and goes on and off per how they lay on it. Never worried about it being plugged in while I was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 heating pads work
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of this bed we’ve bought for our newest pup. Tonight we plugged it in for the first time (we use the beds without the heating pad in the summer) and the heating pad doesn’t work. Tried several different outlets and it still doesn’t work. Reached out to tech support. Will update if we get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe mine is defective?
customer_reviews.text: If I exhaled on the bed for a minute, it would be warmer than what the pad produces. It produces a 2-3 degrees difference compared to ambient air. I was expecting a noticeably warmer surface, but the blanket my cat used to sleep on is warmer on its own compared to this bed. If you are thinking about buying this, I would suggest not wasting the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Graziano

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: So, this makes for an excellent bed if you take out the heating pad. It's soft. But the heating pad part of it absolutely did not work. Tested it tons of times, followed all the directions, took out the heating pad itself, plugged it in and tested it. And it never got hot. Maybe ever so slightly lukewarm, but not enough to make a difference at all. Maybe we got a defective one. But we've decided to keep it because our elderly cat likes sleeping in it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Fat cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and opened. There is a slight chemical smell, but it airs out quickly. I plugged it in & let it warm up for about 10 mins. The heat is very subtle to our touch, but the cat’s sure do notice. It took my fat cat 10 mins to find & seek the warmth. I used a little temptation of catnip directly in the middle which was enough to get him to step in & feel the warmth under his paws. For reference, he is 14lbs & I purchased the large (18”).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: kitty bed
customer_reviews.text: The kitties love it. Hard to fit both cats into the bed, although we bought the biggest size. But sometimes, they try to get into it together. Whoever is home gets first dibs on this great bed. We should have purchased something like this years ago for our outdoor guys. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Stern

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Bed on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bed my cat has ever actually slept in reliably. I honestly can’t say enough nice things about it. It’s super easy to clean (there’s a small learning curve getting the foam liner in and out but it’s easy once you get the hang of it), it is the perfect size, and my cat seems to endorse it because she’s literally always in it. I’d recommend getting a catnip oil to spray on it for picky cats (mine) to initially entice them to try the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why others have mentioned that there is no heat cause it seems to be just the right temp for my two cats. This is the second bed of this type I have purchased, the first one was the smaller size which is just perfect for one cat to curl up in. The larger one lets them both snuggle together. I would not say that there are "easy to clean" but also not impossible and I have had the first one now for I believe over a year and it is still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this heated bed! They are both pretty big cats, and they get in together and enjoy the heat (See the Picture). Their bed is in a relatively cool basement, so this is a big hit with them! Just so everyone knows, this doesn't get as hot as a heating pad, but it does generate enough warmth to keep them happy. We keep it on all of the time. Your cats won't be disappointed with this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Happy as a clam
customer_reviews.text: I got this today and I wasn't sure after reading reviews if it would work or if my cat would use it/notice it was warm. Needless to say even though he ignored my coaxing early in the day, he eventually made his way into the bed and loves it! This is a relief for me as he was born with only one kidney which makes him skinnier than most cats. Plus, I needed something to keep him off of my computer while I'm working from home during covid (I keep finding random coded messages that he has typed while getting comfy on my laptop keyboard...)
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly cat loves this bed. It is only warm if you leave your hand on it for a minute (or a cat) and is very low warmth- think of warmth of where someone had been sitting. My cat is on the larger size- he is an elderly Maine Coon and down to 11 lbs and he has plenty of room to curl up. A cat over 15 lbs may be too big. My little cat that is 8 lbs has lots of space left in the bed.
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought one of these by when my little old girl got sick (she's okay now) and she loved it so much she stayed in it all the time. Eventually one of my boys found it and that was it she was displaced. So I came back to buy 2 more for the boys, the covered version was on sale for less than the uncovered ones so I got two of those. Now everyone's toasty and happy. If you're curious the uncovered version is a little deeper and the pad was a *tiny* bit thicker in it, but the cats don't seem to prefer one over the other.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Cats are in Love!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat's used to sleep with me but now they are completely obsessed with their heated beds. Both of mine are senior kitties who move a little more slowly and they just love their beds especially right now in the winter. I have them in the front windows so they get a view too. It's their favorite place to be. So Spoiled!!😻
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Violet

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old kitty loves this bed more than anything. We ended up getting a 2nd one so he has one in his bedroom and one in the living room. He is usually in one or the other bed. Keeps him warm and cozy and hopefully soothes his aging body. I've had one for 5 years and it is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: They love them!
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats absolutely love these beds! We bought two, we were a little concerned they would be too small as our kitties are 13 and 14 pounds. But as you can see they fit great. They seem to really enjoy the back support and the heated bottom. They can spend hours in these beds!
customer_reviews.author: EKanas

customer_reviews.title: excellent bed for cats without mobility problems.
customer_reviews.text: this is a big hit. its my second one, and the one i got years ago still going strong. i wouldn't use it on a cat who is too frail to get around easily, b/c they would struggle to get out of it (use flat pad for them). keeps the chubby ones off your lap in the winter when you are tired of your legs going to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: fern

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed! It is so warm and cozy and this bed is his favorite place to sleep, especially in the winter time. I leave it plugged in for weeks at a time and there have been no issues.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: It really works. Happy cat.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Happy cat. 20" diameter fits my 15 lb. cat perfectly.. At first, he circled it then left. Then I put a small favorite towel on it, and a book (for pressure to get it warmed throughout the cushion). My cat came back and completely relaxed, sunk into the bed, and promptly fell asleep. I bought this because it has been unusually cold. My cat started to sneeze and get watery eyes. Had never needed an electric blanket before. He goes to this heated regularly at night. Only 4 watts/hr., costing about 1 cent per day, so it is way way more efficient than an area heater (a small area heater is 1500 watts/hr).
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Heating pad seems weak, but very soft
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my three cats, and only one of them uses it regularly. The heating pad seems too weak to penetrate the cushion above it to really provide any actual heat, but otherwise its a nice little cat bed. I thought the sides would be a little sturdier, makes it awkward for my large cat to climb in when it all smashes down as he steps on the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Heat your cat not your house
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats who tend to hug the heating vents during the long Wisconsin winter. Pros: •wash-up nicely •video showing step by step washing instructions (here or on YouTube) •still working well after one year of use (used 20-15 hours per day) •Lowers my heating bill Cons: •comes in the squarish shape see. In my pic. Takes a long time to round out. Cats font seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Frey

customer_reviews.title: Cats Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: My cat couldn’t be happier! At 21 years, I worry that he stays warm enough. This bed is great! I have it connected to a smart plug so it isn’t on all the time, but this is the only place he sleeps now. He likes it so much, I bought a second one for our cabin. I think the warmth also helps his joints. He isn’t as stiff as he used to be when he first wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca13.1

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 21 yr old cat who has arthritis. He loves warms spots as most cats do, but was hoping this would help with his discomfort. He LOVES it. He has been in this bed all day every day since we got it. I have also recommended to others. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Shipping needs to be worked on!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and my cats like them. Both came squished in the box and now look like toilets instead of circles. The foam is destroyed where it is bent so it won’t go back into the right shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: LONG LASTING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bucket TWO YEARS AGO (it's still working great and I keep it plugged in 24/7) and I'm back to buy another one because my cat loves it so much she's sleeping in it downstairs rather than coming upstairs to the bedroom to sleep in bed with me. I don't want to get rid of the bed downstairs since that's where I work at my desk, so now I have to buy a second bed to put upstairs so I can have my cat back!
customer_reviews.author: H. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Now I have a happy cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my senior female cat. She used to want to be on my lap all the time. Now she only wants to be in this bed. Sometimes she puts her chin on the edge. Most of the time she curls up so small I can’t tell she’s in there. Best thing I have ever bought for her.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: My cat snores now.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed. He absolutely loves this bed. I catch him snoring and he never has. He's REALLY into it. Sometimes he gets hot in it and sits next to it and once he cools down he gets right back into it. Ive had for almost 2 months and will update if it breaks but so far it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: TheonlyProPooperScooper

customer_reviews.title: The 5 star reviews helped me make my decision, I give it five stars too!
customer_reviews.text: I have a skittish cat and wasn't sure she would like this new substitute for her current unheated bed. With all of the excellent recommendations, I decided to give it a try. No worries, she loves it! I noticed a lot of questions about size. I bought the 16" and it is a cuddle nest for my 11 lb. cat. There's not enough room for her to stretch out like in larger oval shaped beds, but this is perfect for cold weather snoozing. If she wants to stretch out for a nap, there are plenty of other places she has to go.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Emma LOVES her bed!
customer_reviews.text: Merry Christmas to Emma! My kitty LOVES this bed. The heat helps, but even when it’s not plugged in, she loves it. I don’t allow her on the furniture. With this bed she is able to sit near us when we watch movies. We bought a larger bed, and she will curl up, but also likes to stretch out in it. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Life is for Joy!

customer_reviews.title: Great heated bed, but my cat doesn't like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great cat bed. It takes a while for it to heat up but it says that in the manual. You have to press down to actually feel the heat so it does work. The only con is that my cat hates it. He just sniffs it and avoids it at all costs. I wanted it so I could put it in my desk so he would be comfortable while I'm busy with work or school, but no. Great bed but my cat doesn't like it :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cantero

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I really hoped my cats would love this, but they never even tried it. They love my heated blanket, so I thought they would go crazy for this. It isnt very warm (definitely not nearly as warm as a heated blanket) but it was supposed to be a comfortable temperature for pets. 4 stars for this amazing idea for our pets. Sadly returned because my cats had no interest.
customer_reviews.author: Trebeca

customer_reviews.title: Every kitty should have this
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love them. I have three of these heated beds for four cats. They are in constant use. Once in a while someone pukes on the heated bed. No biggie. Heat pad slides out of zipper and whole thing is washable. Very cool. Every kitty should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin B Trunnell

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my cat on recommendation of a neighbor who loves the bed. It did not get warm enough for my cat. One must know my baby will get on my heating pad so perhaps I was wanting more than it would deliver. Sorry it did not work as it looked great..
customer_reviews.author: judy hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Get enough for all your cats!
customer_reviews.text: At first I only got one cat bed, to see how they like it. Fights ensued regarding who got to use the bed. So I got two more, and the cats spend most of their time in these, especially when the weather gets chilly. The cats range in weight from 10-20lbs, and the 20" beds work well for all of them (roomy, even). We put the beds on a power-strip and a smart outlet so they are easy to turn on and off via smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: averath

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pet bed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed for several months now and it was worth the upgrade. We keep our house at 62 degrees and was worried about our old man kitty. He used to stay in a smaller covered bed but needed a new one. We got this one and he instantly claimed it. He even let his younger sister share it with him. Both kitties are in the 13 lb range so there is some extra space that can be filled up with a blanket for a solo kitty.
customer_reviews.author: Jks

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase we ever made!!
customer_reviews.text: We also give it 10 stars. Bought this because our kitty was always seeking warm places like our laps or heater vents. Now as soon as it begins to get cold she is in the bed 24/7 except to eat or use the litter box. I worried that the heating pad would be too hot for her or whatever we placed it on but both have been fine. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Candy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Disapppointed
customer_reviews.text: Just received this bed and so far my picky kitty has refused to have anything to do with it. However, it does seem a little small. I debated between the 16 inch and the 20 inch. Kitty is 11 lbs and the 16 inch diameter is the outside diameter. Since the sides are about 2 inches thick, the bed is only about 12 inches. Snug but hopefully when the weather turns cold again, she'll accept it. It is well made and works nicely, Just a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: B Locke

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older cat who absolutely loves this little heated bed! She spends most of her sleeping time here. It doesn't get hot like a heating pad or electric blanket, but provides just enough warmth that she seeks it out. The fabric is soft and the bed is well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: MTL

customer_reviews.title: This bed is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed, my cat thinks it’s just okay. I leave it plugged in all the time and it never gets too hot. My cat is really picky, and stopped getting inside when winter slowed down and it got warmer in the house. She loved it for about 2 months though, and I think she’ll probably use it again this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our older, frail cat. She seemed to be cold all the time. We put her in the bed the day we got it and she automatically knew it was hers. The bed warms up to the perfect temperature when she gets in, and goes off when she gets out. She spends hours in it, each day.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great bed to keep the cat away from the laptop!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a way to get the cat away from the warm laptops and keyboards now that we’re working from home, so we though we’d give the bed a try. We haven’t even turned it on (waiting until it gets cold) and it seems to be working well so far! The fabric is very soft and it looks easy enough to remove the pad to clean it. We have the 20in. We set it up in one of our desks and she naps happily until work is over. Each picture is a different day, so it’s been a huge success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Kitties Warm in the Winter
customer_reviews.text: We have three barn cats. As Winter approached, we bought the heated beds. The cats took to the beds quite quickly and loved them. In fact, they loved them so much and I hardly saw a kitty all Winter (they were warm and snug, so I don't blame them). Would highly recommend for your cat during cold weather or even in the house for your indoor kitties.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Balsley

customer_reviews.title: Boo Grr purr of approval
customer_reviews.text: Oh behalf of my baby, this gets 5 stars and 5 naps. We live in the south but heating the house really bugs my skin and sinuses, so I keep my heat on at a relatively brisk 55, a fact that has seriously seemed to bother my kitty. Now instead of trying to capture residual butt warmth from any chair vacated, he is happily ensconced is his heated bed and doesn't get snarly when we want to sit back down. If it's too cold for him in the house, he will come part way out, tip the bed on edge and proceed to rub his butt on the still warm pad, showing his reluctance to leave.
customer_reviews.author: Closet Wench

customer_reviews.title: Now I need 2 of them!
customer_reviews.text: At first when I received this bed, neither cat was interested in it. I left it plugged in and after about a week, both of my cats discovered that they really liked it and now take turns napping in it constantly. It makes me happy to know that in our frigid Michigan winters, my senior kitties are cozy and warm. Now I just need to order another one! Side note: I ordered the smaller size hoping my larger cat would still fit (16lbs) and he does no problem. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Catmamma

customer_reviews.title: Helped my sick cat have comfort during his last days.
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old cat just passed away from mouth cancer 2 weeks ago. I had purchased this larger bed for him in November when the weather starting getting a little chilly. This bed provided him much comfort during the cold winter months when he started losing weight and fur from the cancer. It fit him very well when he was larger at 11 pounds. He took to this bed right away, I did not have to coax or bribe him to get into it. I just plugged it in and right away he knew what to do. I would recommend this bed for any healthy or sick cat that is too large for the smaller size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Splat

product_meta.title: K&H Pet Products 3191 Thermo-Kitty Heated Pet Bed Small Mocha 16" 4W
product_meta.description: Size:Large (18")| Style:Retail BoxThe K&H thermo-kitty bed has a dual thermostat 4 watt heating unit buried deep within its thick, super soft, orthopedic foam base. It warms the surface 10-15 degrees above ambient air temperature to your cat's normal body temperature When in use. The washable cover comes in two colors and is attractive in any room in the house. Indoor use only. One year limited .
feature_bullets: Cat heated bed features soft foam walls for your cat's comfort
Electric cat bed is thermostatically controlled to automatically respond to tempature changes to warm to your pet's normal body temperature only when your pet is in the bed
Removable cover for Easy wash and care
This cat bed heated has been tested & certified by met Labs to exceed USA/CA electrical safety standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
